SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.service.auth

Interface AuthorizationCodeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseAuthorizationCodeService
public interface AuthorizationCodeService
Service interface for authorization code management. Defines methods for validating, generating, and managing authorization codes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Airport Gate Management System

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default boolean
    deactivateAuthCode(Long id)
    Deactivates an authorization code by ID.
    default void
    deleteAuthCode(Long id)
    Deletes an authorization code from the system.
    default String
    generateNewCode(UserRole role, String description, LocalDateTime expiresAt)
    Generates a new authorization code for a specific role.
    default List<AuthorizationCodeModel>
    getAllAuthCodes()
    Retrieves all authorization codes in the system.
    boolean
    isValidAuthCode(String authCode, UserRole requestedRole)
    Validates whether a given authorization code grants access to a specific role.
    default void
    markCodeAsUsed(String authCode, UserModel user)
    Marks an authorization code as used by a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • isValidAuthCode

      boolean isValidAuthCode(String authCode, UserRole requestedRole)
      Validates whether a given authorization code grants access to a specific role. This method ensures that users can only register for roles they are authorized to hold.
      Parameters:
      authCode - The authorization code provided during registration
      requestedRole - The role the user is attempting to register for
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid for the requested role, false otherwise

    • markCodeAsUsed

      default void markCodeAsUsed(String authCode, UserModel user)
      Marks an authorization code as used by a specific user. This method updates the code record to indicate which user used it and when.
      Parameters:
      authCode - The authorization code to mark as used
      user - The user who used the code

    • generateNewCode

      default String generateNewCode(UserRole role, String description, LocalDateTime expiresAt)
      Generates a new authorization code for a specific role. Creates a secure random code and stores it in the database.
      Parameters:
      role - The role the code will authorize
      description - A description of the code's purpose
      expiresAt - When the code will expire (null for no expiration)
      Returns:
      The generated code string

    • getAllAuthCodes

      default List<AuthorizationCodeModel> getAllAuthCodes()
      Retrieves all authorization codes in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all authorization codes

    • deactivateAuthCode

      default boolean deactivateAuthCode(Long id)
      Deactivates an authorization code by ID. Deactivated codes can no longer be used for registration.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the code to deactivate
      Returns:
      true if deactivation was successful, false if code wasn't found

    • deleteAuthCode

      default void deleteAuthCode(Long id)
      Deletes an authorization code from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the code to delete
